name: Blueshift
description: fly and jet around vast landscapes at ridiculous speeds. Spread your wings and use your rocket boosters to glide, do tricks, go off jumps, ski, or anything you can imagine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 4690k Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia 970 or AMD equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires an HTC Vive VR headset to play
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 4690k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 970 or AMD equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires an HTC Vive VR headset to play
